Misc¶

makeindex¶

If a file name makeindex.sty is created in the blobs directory, then it will be used when invoking the command makeindex (as makeindex -s makeindex.sty file). See an example in test/paper/makeindex.sty (that has larger interline space in the first part of the index, where symbols are listed).
